title: The Urban Aquaponics Manual - 2nd Edition
description:
The Urban Aquaponics Manual - 2nd Edition

The most comprehensive manual on Aquaponics currently available - the product of the authorÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s 30 year association with micro-farming. A complete how-to guide that leads you through the whole Aquaponics experience from the tank to table. The advice in the manual will save you its cost many times over by helping you to avoid the pitfalls that have beset most Aquaponicists.

A complete how-to guide that leads you through the whole Aquaponics experience - 90 A4 pages  -  88 colour photos and 17 illustrations.
